channel.title: CVE Feed for KaineLabs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KaineLabs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47191|2024-08-02T21:01:22.813Z -- kainelabs -- youzify%20%E2%80%93%20buddypress%20community%2C%20user%20profile%2C%20social%20network%20%26%20membership%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in KaineLabs Youzify – BuddyPress Community, User Profile, Social Network & Membership Plugin for WordPress.This issue affects Youzify – BuddyPress Community, User Profile, Social Network & Membership Plugin for WordPress: from n/a through 1.2.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-2864|2024-08-01T19:25:42.153Z -- kainelabs -- youzify%20-%20buddypress%20moderation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in KaineLabs Youzify - Buddypress Moderation.This issue affects Youzify - Buddypress Moderation: from n/a through 1.2.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37494|2024-07-09T08:59:56.812Z -- kainelabs -- youzify
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in KaineLabs Youzify.This issue affects Youzify: from n/a through 1.2.5.
